title: Kapil Sharma Posted A Picture Of His College Sweetheart, Introducing Her To The World
text:
facebook 
Kapil Sharma has been tight-lipped when it comes to talking about his relationship. When he was asked about it recently on Koffee With Karan the actor chose to avoid the topic and, instead, talked about his love for actress Deepika Padukone. 
Well, looks like the comedian (or was it his girlfriend) finally got tired of hiding his relationship, and he chose to introduce her to the world this weekend. Of course, because it was Kapil Sharma, it was done it style. 
He first tweeted out a post asking his fans to wait for him to share something special in 30 minutes. Hi..want to share something very beautiful thing with u guys ...wait for 30 mins .. â€” KAPIL (@KapilSharmaK9) 18 March 2017 
He then introduced his better half to the world. Will not say she is my better half .. she completes me .. love u ginni .. please welcome her .. I love her so much:) pic.twitter.com/IqB6VKauM5 
And he also tweeted this, for good measure. @deepikapadukone deepu... now m not gona miss u .. hahahahaha.. love always pic.twitter.com/9cjQKiiEvj
